title: US Ambassador meets Air Force Commander; Discusses security in Sri Lanka and Info-Pacific Region
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); US Ambassador to Sri Lanka Julie J. Chung met with Sri Lanka Air Force Commander Sudarshana Pathirana in Colombo on Friday (27).
The Ambassador tweeted that a strong, secure Sri Lanka is critical to the stability & prosperity of the Indo-Pacific region.
The Ambassador and the Air Force Commander discussed about efforts to strengthen defense cooperation in the region & ongoing commitment to Sri Lankan security.
